data.comment: Today's referee, Tiago Martins, has blown to start the match.
Porto's Zaidu Sanusi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 1, Tiago Martins awards Tondela a goal kick.
Moussa Marega for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Porto.
In the minute 4, Zaidu Sanusi scores to make it 1-0 at Estadio do Dragao.
Great play from Otavio to set up the goal.
Porto's Moussa Marega breaks free at Estadio do Dragao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio do Dragao.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tondela's Mario Gonzalez is whistled for offside at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Porto's Mehdi Taremi has run offside.
Throw-in for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Porto to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
In the minute 14, Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mehdi Taremi for Porto drives towards goal at Estadio do Dragao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Tiago Martins signals a Porto throw-in in Tondela's half.
Porto to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
In the minute 20, Goal! Mario Gonzalez equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Rafael Barbosa.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 22, Zaidu Sanusi (Porto) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Tondela defenders.
Tondela needs to be cautious. Porto have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Porto.
In the minute 24, Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
Tondela have a goal kick.
In Porto Tondela attack through Rafael Barbosa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tiago Martins awards Tondela a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Porto.
Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Tiago Martins signals a Porto throw-in in Tondela's half.
Porto have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Porto in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 32, Otavio (Porto) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Porto.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
In the minute 33, Mateus Uribe gets his shot on target but fails to score for Porto.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Tondela.
Rafael Barbosa is on target to give Tondela a 1-2 advantage.
In the minute 33, Enzo Martinez with an assist there.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Goal! Moussa Marega levels the match at 2-2.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick Porto.
At Estadio do Dragao, Abdel Jalil has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 40, Porto's Mateus Uribe has been booked in Porto.
Tiago Martins awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
In the minute 41, In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick in a good position for Porto!
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Porto.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Tondelaâ€™s Joao Pedro is on his feet again at Estadio do Dragao.
Moussa Marega (Porto) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
The first-half has come to a close in Porto.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Joao Pedro for Tondela who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio do Dragao.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 48, Goal! Moussa Marega gives Porto a 3-2 lead in Porto.
Otavio instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Porto in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Porto to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
In the minute 54, Throw-in Porto.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, Tiago Martins signals a Porto throw-in in Tondela's half.
Mehdi Taremi puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 4-2.
Great play from Mateus Uribe to set up the goal.
In the minute 58, Sergio Oliveira for Porto gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Tondela have a goal kick.
Porto to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
In the minute 59, Mehdi Taremi of Porto smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 60, Porto's Sergio Oliveira breaks free at Estadio do Dragao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
Tiago Martins signals a Tondela throw-in in Porto's half.
In the minute 62, Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pedro Augusto (Tondela) has received a first yellow card.
In Porto Porto drive forward through Sergio Oliveira. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Shoya Nakajima is replacing Luis Diaz for the home team.
The home team replace Mehdi Taremi with Evanilson.
In the minute 66, Fabio Vieira is on a sub for Sergio Oliveira for Porto.
Tiago Martins signals a throw-in for Porto, close to Tondela's area.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Free kick Porto.
Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Pako Ayestaran (Tondela) is making a first substitution, with Bebeto replacing Tiago.
In the minute 72, Tondela make their second substitution with Joao Mendes replacing Joao Pedro.
Goal! Mario Gonzalez pulls one back for Tondela to make it 4-3.
Pedro Augusto with an assist there.
In the minute 75, Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
In the minute 78, Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Porto.
Joao Mendes (Tondela) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 79, Evanilson (Porto) has received a yellow card from Tiago Martins.
Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio do Dragao.
Free kick for Tondela in the half of Porto.
In the minute 81, Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Porto.
Throw-in for Porto in the half of Tondela.
Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Porto in the half of Tondela.
Marko Grujic is replacing Moussa Marega for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
Jaume Grau for Tondela has been booked by Tiago Martins and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 83, Tiago Martins waits before resuming play because Fabio Vieira for Porto is still down.
The home team replace Otavio with Jesus Corona.
Fabio Vieira returns to the field for Porto after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Tondela close to the penalty box.
Tondela make their third substitution with Mohamed Naoufel Khacef replacing Rafael Barbosa.
Pako Ayestaran is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio do Dragao with Souleymane Anne replacing Filipe Ferreira.
In the minute 86, Throw-in Tondela.
Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 87, It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto.
Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Evanilson of Porto is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 89, Tiago Martins signals a Porto throw-in in Tondela's half.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Free kick Tondela.
Tiago Martins will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Important block from the Porto defence as Jaume Grau fires in a strike for Tondela.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tondela's Jaume Grau misses with an attempt on goal.
Tiago Martins awards Porto a goal kick.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
Tondela apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Mohamed Naoufel Khacef. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Full-time! The final score is 4-3.
Enzo Martinez (Tondela) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Mateus Uribe (Porto) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
